steps.section: α-Synuclein aggregation monitored by thioflavin-T (ThT) fluorescence in a plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0mj5","text":"Mix reagents to a final concentration of   α-Synuclein, 0.05 % NaN3,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":66,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7b032","text":"  ThT in α-Synuclein fibril buffer. Prepare a mix for 4.5 reactions per condition (per condition, four technical replicates in each plate). Final volume is   per well. steps.section: α-Synuclein aggregation monitored by thioflavin-T (ThT) fluorescence in a plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2nc1e","text":"Dispense   of the mix into a well of a 96 well half-area plate of black polystyrene with a clear bottom.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evssv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.section: α-Synuclein aggregation monitored by thioflavin-T (ThT) fluorescence in a plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4h9vr","text":"If possible, the outer wells should not be used and should be filled them with water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ub8d","text":"Seal the plate with parafilm to avoid evaporation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: α-Synuclein aggregation monitored by thioflavin-T (ThT) fluorescence in a plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2caad","text":"Set the following parameters in a SPARK multimode microplate reader (TECAN) and start the reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3j6bg","text":"Fluorescence measurement: ThT signal, excitation 440 nm, emission 480 nm, (use gain regulation) measured every  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4gjrd","text":"Temperature  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bugg","text":"Constant shaking (  linear shaking: amplitude 1.5 mm, frequency 1080 rpm -   orbital shaking: amplitude 1 mm, frequency 510 rpm).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dc3ef","text":" multimode microplate reader (TECAN) is highly recommended due to its high sensitivity and the gain regulation mode that increases the fluorescence detection window. When using other plate readers, the sample ThT signal easily gets saturated even when reducing initial gain to the minimum gain capacity. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cima4","text":"Under these conditions α-Synuclein (A53T) slowly aggregates, reaching the ThT plateau after approximately 50 h aggregation.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}},"5":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":342,"id":439807,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppsbbixhp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppr9bixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppsabixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppr8bixhp.webp","width":483}}}}
